message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11500. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. That's the most I'm willing to pay.
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $10000 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10500, but that's my final offer.  Let me know if you're interested.
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
